name: No Jumping Around!
description:
No Jumping Around! is a 2d black & white platformer where you can not jump. You need to use various mecanics like dashing, jumping off ramps, and bouncing on jump pads to get across the levels. Also featuring dad jokes.

Made in 14 days for the B&W game jam  - April 2021

My first game.

Will be making a devlog video soon.
